TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullableConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供可為 Null 的類型及其基礎基本類型之間的自動轉換。

span.span: Provides automatic conversion between a nullable type and its underlying primitive type.
